posts.author: Brenz
posts.title: I am so tired of searching for a data job
posts.body: Everyday, I get the feeling that all the studies about data science that I have learned throughout my college degree would become worthless if I pursue my passion as a developer. For the past 3 months, I was bouncing around learning new skills from data to development hoping that I'd finally get a job at something, it didn't have to be data, nor development, I just wanted to feel like a professional after graduating. I'm just really frustrated and envious that all of my college classmates and friends have found data-related jobs and are thriving. As for me, I'm slowly succumbing to my own thoughts in existential crisis.

posts.author: Anya Forger
posts.title: Anya likes peanuts
posts.body: I like peanuts and I don't like carrots, but I really like crispy bacon from bakeries.
